casebody.data:
KELLY
v.
DUKE UNIVERSITY. No. 324P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2009. Meredith Taylor Berard, Raleigh, for Duke University. George W. Lennon, Raleigh, for Kelly. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 661 S.E.2d 745 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of January 2009 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2009."
